text: __NOTOC__ Wulfhun was a Bishop of Selsey. In 931 Wulfhun witnessed a charter of King Athelstan, although his see is not mentioned.Anglo-Saxons.net Charters S413 accessed on 25 August 2007 According to Kelly, Wulfhun continued to attest until 940, but was no longer in office by 943.Kelly Charters of Selsey p. xci It is therefore assumed that Wulfhun died between 940 and 943.Fryde, et al. Handbook of British Chronology p. 221 ==Citations== ==References== * * ==Further reading== * ==External links== * Category:Bishops of Selsey Category:10th-century bishops
title: Wulfhun
